comments.body: oh I see what's been done, you can ignore the overload comments above, this should provide what was intended
Double checking is it really Image ?
This overload won't work without explicit type argument. See [discussion on TypeScript project site](https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/471751) and vote please!

Just curious if you meant to remove this `implements` which you previously added and @evilangelist agreed on https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped/pull/1342/files#diff-94d0aa4ddae02b6a8ca05de781e46906R123
In easeljs0.7.1, ColorMatrix Class stopped the inheritance of Array officially.

Thanks you are right compared https://github.com/CreateJS/EaselJS/blob/release_v0.7.0/src/easeljs/filters/ColorMatrix.js?source=cc#L55-L60 with https://github.com/CreateJS/EaselJS/blob/release_v0.7.1/src/easeljs/filters/ColorMatrix.js#L59

BitmapAnimation has already been deleted.
And, addChild(), addChildAt(), removeChild(), removeChildAt(), and removeAllChildren()  are missing in BitmapText class.
Command class has already been deleted.
